title: Qualcomm to Acquire Arduino
summary:
The provided text is extremely limited. It's just a title: "Qualcomm to Acquire Arduino" and the indication that the full content requires Javascript to run. Therefore, the summary will be based *solely* on the title.

Based on the title "Qualcomm to Acquire Arduino—Accelerating Developers’ Access to its Leading Edge Computing and AI | Qualcomm", the main point is that **Qualcomm is planning to acquire Arduino.**

The title also suggests a key reason for the acquisition: Qualcomm believes acquiring Arduino will **accelerate developers' access to its leading-edge computing and AI technologies.** This implies that Qualcomm sees Arduino as a valuable platform for expanding the reach and adoption of its technologies among developers. The acquisition would likely allow Qualcomm to integrate its computing and AI capabilities more directly into the Arduino ecosystem, providing developers with easier access to advanced tools and resources.

title: You're Doing Rails Wrong
summary:
This humorous article satirizes the trend of over-complicating Rails development by layering on numerous modern JavaScript tools and frameworks. Kevin enthusiastically advocates for incorporating technologies like Vite, React, Babel, PostCSS, Tailwind, ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and potentially Next.js or Remix for server-side rendering, all on top of Rails. He also suggests StimulusReflex or Hotwire for reactive components, requiring ActionCable and Redis. To manage this complex environment, he proposes Docker, Docker Compose, Fly.io, and GitHub Actions.

John, initially impressed, becomes increasingly overwhelmed by the ever-expanding stack. The core point of the article is highlighted when John effortlessly demonstrates the power and simplicity of "Vanilla Rails," implying that developers often needlessly introduce complexity for the sake of using the latest technologies when Rails, in its core form, can be remarkably efficient and productive. The article ultimately champions sticking to the core principles of Rails and avoiding unnecessary bloat from external dependencies.
chinese_title: 你用Rails的方式不对
chinese_summary:
这篇幽默文章讽刺了过度复杂化 Rails 开发的趋势，即通过堆叠大量的现代 JavaScript 工具和框架。凯文热情地倡导在 Rails 基础上整合 Vite、React、Babel、PostCSS、Tailwind、ESLint、Prettier、Husky 等技术，甚至可能包括用于服务器端渲染的 Next.js 或 Remix。他还建议使用 StimulusReflex 或 Hotwire 来构建响应式组件，这需要 ActionCable 和 Redis。为了管理这种复杂的环境，他建议使用 Docker、Docker Compose、Fly.io 和 GitHub Actions。

约翰起初印象深刻，但随着技术栈的不断扩展，他变得越来越不知所措。当约翰轻松展示“原生 Rails”的强大和简洁时，文章的核心观点得以凸显，暗示着开发者常常为了使用最新技术而无谓地引入复杂性，而 Rails 本身的核心形式可能非常高效和富有成效。这篇文章最终倡导坚持 Rails 的核心原则，避免来自外部依赖的不必要膨胀。

title: IKEA Catalogs 1951-2021
summary:
This page from the IKEA Museum website celebrates the IKEA catalog, which was produced from 1951 to 2021. Now available digitally, these catalogs offer a glimpse into the history of IKEA, interior design trends, and everyday Swedish life.

The digital archive makes the catalog accessible to everyone. The catalogs changed dramatically over the years, reflecting evolving trends and social norms. Earlier catalogs rarely featured people, while later editions showcased children playing and reflected cultural shifts like smoking or political views.

While only Swedish catalogs are currently available digitally, the IKEA Museum hopes to expand the archive in the future. The catalogs featured only a selection of the products available in stores.

The website offers search functionality within the catalogs, and while detailed information about older products may be difficult to find, the museum offers assistance when possible. Before 1951, IKEA was a mail-order company and didn't sell furniture.

Although the IKEA Museum maintains a small physical archive of the catalogs for preservation purposes, the digital archive serves as the primary accessible resource. Users are permitted to download and share a limited number of catalogs and images for non-commercial purposes, provided proper credit is given. The website offers press materials, and while the museum doesn't need more catalogs, they are interested in hearing from people with unique IKEA related historical material.
chinese_title: 宜家产品目录 1951-2021
chinese_summary:
宜家博物馆网站的这个页面是为了庆祝宜家目录，该目录从1951年出版至2021年。现在以数字形式提供，这些目录让人们得以一窥宜家的历史、室内设计趋势以及瑞典人的日常生活。

数字档案使所有人都能访问这些目录。这些目录多年来发生了显著变化，反映了不断发展的趋势和社会规范。早期的目录很少出现人物，而后来的版本则展示了儿童玩耍，并反映了吸烟或政治观点等文化转变。

虽然目前只有瑞典语目录以数字形式提供，但宜家博物馆希望在未来扩展该档案。这些目录仅精选了商店中销售的部分产品。

该网站提供目录内的搜索功能，虽然可能难以找到有关旧产品的详细信息，但博物馆会在可能的情况下提供帮助。1951年之前，宜家是一家邮购公司，并不销售家具。

虽然宜家博物馆为了保存目的而保留了少量纸质目录档案，但数字档案是主要的访问资源。用户可以下载和分享有限数量的目录和图像用于非商业目的，但必须注明出处。该网站提供新闻资料，虽然博物馆不再需要更多的目录，但他们有兴趣听取拥有与宜家相关的独特历史材料的人们的故事。

title: Show HN: Timelinize – Privately organize your own data from everywhere, locally
summary:
Timelinize is an open-source personal archival suite that helps users organize their data from various sources (photos, videos, messages, social media, etc.) onto a single, unified timeline on their own computer, ensuring privacy and control. Unlike apps that store data in the cloud, Timelinize preserves a richer, more complete story of a user's life.

It doesn't replace existing apps but acts as a "behind-the-scenes" archive, importing data from services like Facebook, Google Photos, iMessage, Strava, and more. Timelinize offers multiple views of the data, including a timeline, a map that geolocates data, conversation views across platforms, and a gallery.

Key features include flexible, high-speed imports, support for live photos, entity-aware processing to merge data points, and the ability to geo-locate data without coordinates. It also features advanced location processing, a CLI and HTTP API for developers, semantic search, and a flexible schema.

Future plans include creating annotations and stories from the timeline, augmenting it with public data like weather and news, secure data sharing with family, and mobile apps with direct syncing. The application emphasizes self-contained, portable repositories and avoids proprietary storage schemes, allowing users to explore their data with other tools. The goal is to leverage data already being generated without disrupting existing workflows.
chinese_title: Show HN: Timelinize – 在本地私密地整理来自各处你自己的数据
chinese_summary:
Timelinize：一款开源个人档案套件，帮助用户将来自各种来源（照片、视频、消息、社交媒体等）的数据整理到自己计算机上的一个统一时间线上，从而确保隐私和控制。与将数据存储在云端的应用程序不同，Timelinize保留了用户生活中更丰富、更完整的故事。

它不会取代现有应用程序，而是充当“幕后”档案，从Facebook、Google Photos、iMessage、Strava等服务导入数据。Timelinize提供数据的多种视图，包括时间线、地理定位数据的地图、跨平台的对话视图和图库。

主要功能包括灵活的高速导入、对Live Photos的支持、用于合并数据点的实体感知处理，以及在没有坐标的情况下对数据进行地理定位的能力。它还具有高级位置处理、适用于开发人员的CLI和HTTP API、语义搜索以及灵活的模式。

未来的计划包括从时间线创建注释和故事，用天气和新闻等公共数据对其进行扩充，与家人安全共享数据，以及具有直接同步功能的移动应用程序。该应用程序强调独立的、可移植的存储库，并避免使用专有存储方案，从而允许用户使用其他工具探索他们的数据。其目标是利用已生成的数据，而不会中断现有的工作流程。

title: Police Said They Surveilled Woman Who Had an Abortion for Her 'Safety.'
summary: In May, 404 Media reported that the Johnson County Sheriff's Office in Texas used Flock cameras, an AI-powered license plate surveillance system, to locate a woman who had a self-administered abortion. The sheriff's office claimed the search was not criminal in nature but conducted solely for the woman's safety, citing concerns she might be bleeding to death. Flock also stated that the woman was never under criminal investigation and was being searched for as a missing person. The rest of the article is only accessible to paid subscribers.
chinese_title: 警方称，他们监视了一名堕胎女性，是为了她的“安全”。
chinese_summary: 五月，404 Media 报道称，德克萨斯州约翰逊县警长办公室使用 Flock 摄像头（一种人工智能车牌监控系统）定位了一名自行堕胎的女性。警长办公室声称，搜寻并非刑事性质，而是完全为了该女性的安全，并称担心她可能失血过多致死。Flock 也声明该女性从未受到刑事调查，而是作为失踪人员被搜寻。文章的其余部分只有付费订阅者才能访问。

title: Launch HN: LlamaFarm (YC W22) – Open-source framework for distributed AI
summary:
LlamaFarm is an open-source framework designed to simplify the creation of retrieval-augmented and agentic AI applications. It offers a local-first development experience with a CLI tool (`lf`) for managing projects, datasets, and chat sessions. Key features include opinionated defaults (Ollama, Chroma), extensibility to swap components like models and databases, production-ready architecture, and composable RAG pipelines configurable via YAML.

The framework emphasizes "config over code," utilizing YAML schemas for project definition, and offers a friendly CLI for tasks like project initialization, dataset management, and RAG queries. It's built to be extended with new providers, vector stores, parsers, and CLI commands.

LlamaFarm includes a comprehensive REST API (OpenAI-compatible) for integration.  The `llamafarm.yaml` file serves as the single source of truth for project configuration.

The article provides quickstart instructions using Docker, along with details on running services manually.  It also includes example applications for FDA letters and Raleigh UDO planning, demonstrating multi-document ingestion and geospatial queries. The documentation covers development and testing procedures, community support channels, and the Apache 2.0 license.
chinese_title: 发布 HN：LlamaFarm (YC W22) – 分布式 AI 开源框架
chinese_summary:
LlamaFarm 是一个开源框架，旨在简化检索增强和 Agentic AI 应用的创建。它提供以本地优先的开发体验，配备 CLI 工具 (`lf`) 用于管理项目、数据集和聊天会话。主要功能包括约定优于配置（Ollama, Chroma）、可扩展性以替换模型和数据库等组件、生产级架构以及可通过 YAML 配置的可组合 RAG 管道。

该框架强调“配置优于代码”，利用 YAML 模式进行项目定义，并提供友好的 CLI 用于项目初始化、数据集管理和 RAG 查询等任务。它旨在扩展新的提供者、向量存储、解析器和 CLI 命令。

LlamaFarm 包含一个全面的 REST API（OpenAI 兼容），用于集成。`llamafarm.yaml` 文件是项目配置的唯一来源。

本文提供使用 Docker 的快速入门说明，以及手动运行服务的详细信息。它还包括 FDA 信函和罗利 UDO 规划的示例应用程序，演示了多文档摄取和地理空间查询。文档涵盖开发和测试程序、社区支持渠道以及 Apache 2.0 许可。

title: Pigeon (YC W23) is hiring a lead full stack engineer
summary:
Pigeon (YC W23), an AI-powered document automation startup, is hiring a Lead Full Stack Software Engineer to join their team in NYC or remotely within the US. The role offers a salary of $120K - $180K, plus equity (0.50% - 2.00%).

The Lead Engineer will be instrumental in developing new features and systems, shaping the technology stack, processes, and culture. They will own core services, APIs, and integrations, build and scale the AI-powered document processing system, and ship features end-to-end.

The ideal candidate has 5+ years of full-stack experience, is comfortable with a fast-paced startup environment, and can take full ownership of projects. Pigeon automates the document lifecycle, saving businesses time and resources. The company has a team of 4 with experience from Google, Squarespace, Deloitte, and HonorLock, and recently closed a $3.5M Seed round post-YC.

title: Erlang ARM32 JIT is born
summary:
This blog post announces the successful porting of the BEAM JIT to the ARM32-bit architecture, a significant milestone funded by the Erlang Ecosystem Foundation. The team achieved execution of a simple Erlang function, `hello:start/2`, via JIT-compiled ARM32 machine code.

The `hello.erl` module, modified to replace `erl_init:start/2`, simply calls `erlang:halt/2` with an exit code of 42. The article details the compilation process, including generating BEAM assembly for analysis. QEMU is used to emulate ARM32, running `beam.smp` directly.

The JIT initialization involves loading shared code snippets and the `erts_beamasm` module (critical instructions for process execution). By stripping down the preloaded modules to only `hello.erl`, the team simplified the debugging process. The assembly output (obtained using `-JDdump true`) reveals numerous "Not Yet Implemented" (NYI) calls, as only the code path to `halt` is implemented.

The article highlights the journey of the Erlang process, from initial spawn to calling the `apply_only` function and the Erlang function prologue. A key insight is the explanation of tagged values, specifically how the seemingly random number 687 represents the Erlang integer 42 with its BEAM tag for type identification. This accomplishment paves the way for incrementally adding more Erlang instructions and expanding the JIT's capabilities. The code is available on GitHub.
chinese_title: Erlang ARM32 JIT 诞生
chinese_summary:
BEAM JIT 成功移植至 ARM32 位架构

此博文宣布 BEAM JIT 成功移植至 ARM32 位架构，这是 Erlang 生态系统基金会资助的一个重要里程碑。该团队通过 JIT 编译的 ARM32 机器码成功执行了一个简单的 Erlang 函数 `hello:start/2`。

修改后的 `hello.erl` 模块，替换了 `erl_init:start/2`，仅调用 `erlang:halt/2` 并返回退出代码 42。文章详细介绍了编译过程，包括生成用于分析的 BEAM 汇编代码。QEMU 用于模拟 ARM32，直接运行 `beam.smp`。

JIT 初始化涉及加载共享代码片段和 `erts_beamasm` 模块（用于进程执行的关键指令）。通过将预加载模块精简到仅包含 `hello.erl`，团队简化了调试过程。汇编输出（使用 `-JDdump true` 获取）显示了许多 "Not Yet Implemented" (NYI) 调用，因为仅实现了通往 `halt` 的代码路径。

文章重点介绍了 Erlang 进程的历程，从初始生成到调用 `apply_only` 函数和 Erlang 函数序言。一个关键的见解是解释了标签值，特别是看似随机的数字 687 如何表示带有 BEAM 标签的 Erlang 整数 42，用于类型识别。这一成就为逐步添加更多 Erlang 指令和扩展 JIT 的功能铺平了道路。代码可在 GitHub 上找到。

title: How does gradient descent work?
summary:
This article explores how gradient descent works in deep learning, contrasting traditional optimization theory with observed behavior. Traditionally, gradient descent is thought to remain within a "stable region" where the sharpness (largest eigenvalue of the Hessian matrix, S(w)) is less than 2/η (η being the learning rate). However, in practice, training frequently pushes the sharpness beyond this limit, causing the algorithm to exit the stable region.

Despite exceeding this limit, gradient descent doesn't simply diverge. Instead, it oscillates along the top Hessian eigenvector. The key insight is that these oscillations, when large enough, trigger a reduction in the sharpness itself. This is revealed by considering a third-order Taylor expansion, which shows that oscillations along the top Hessian eigenvector implicitly take a negative gradient step on the sharpness of the loss.

This creates a negative feedback loop: when sharpness exceeds 2/η, oscillations grow, and these oscillations, in turn, reduce the sharpness, pulling the system back into the stable region. This phenomenon is called "training at the edge of stability" (EOS). The article illustrates this behavior with videos showing sharpness, loss, and eigenvector displacement during training. The dynamics are shown to be universal across various architectures and datasets. This contradicts traditional optimization theory and highlights the importance of considering higher-order Taylor expansions to understand deep learning optimization.
chinese_title: 梯度下降法是如何运作的？
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了梯度下降在深度学习中的工作原理，并将传统优化理论与观察到的行为进行了对比。传统上，人们认为梯度下降会保持在“稳定区域”内，在该区域内，锐度（Hessian矩阵的最大特征值，S(w)）小于2/η（η为学习率）。然而，在实践中，训练经常将锐度推到超过此限制，导致算法退出稳定区域。

尽管超过了这个限制，梯度下降并不会简单地发散。相反，它会沿着顶部Hessian特征向量振荡。关键的见解是，这些振荡，当足够大时，会触发锐度本身的降低。通过考虑三阶泰勒展开可以揭示这一点，它表明沿着顶部Hessian特征向量的振荡隐式地对损失的锐度采取了一个负梯度步骤。

这创建了一个负反馈回路：当锐度超过2/η时，振荡会增长，而这些振荡反过来会降低锐度，将系统拉回稳定区域。这种现象被称为“边缘稳定性训练”(EOS)。本文用视频展示了训练期间的锐度、损失和特征向量位移，阐明了这种行为。结果表明，这种动态在各种架构和数据集中都具有普遍性。这与传统的优化理论相矛盾，并强调了考虑高阶泰勒展开以理解深度学习优化的重要性。

title: Tcl-Lang Showcase
summary:
This document titled "Tcl-Lang Showcase" is essentially a list of Tcl/Tk projects highlighted on a wiki page. It showcases the versatility of the Tcl scripting language, particularly when used with its GUI toolkit, Tk.

The projects listed cover a range of applications, demonstrating Tcl's capabilities in areas like:

*   **Graphics and Visualization:** Creating Spirographs, rendering 3D polyhedra on a Tk canvas, and possibly a general-purpose 3D canvas implementation (Canvas3d).
*   **GUI Development:** Utilizing and extending Tk's capabilities, including custom geometry managers (Pave), widget pooling (TkPool), and user interface engines (tkEngine).
*   **Games and Simulations:** Developing various games such as 1010!, TriPeaks Solitaire, Triangle Madness, and simulations like an HP-15 calculator simulation.
*   **Utilities and Tools:** Potentially a hyperhelp package and other utilities like GRIDPLUS2.
*   **Programming Concepts:** Demonstrating looping techniques (Zen Loops) and possibly other programming concepts (trains3.tcl).

The presence of wiki page links alongside some project titles suggests these are community-contributed projects or examples, further illustrating Tcl's active user base and readily available resources. In essence, the document acts as a curated list meant to demonstrate the practical applications and strengths of the Tcl and Tk combination.
chinese_title: Tcl语言展示
chinese_summary:
标题为“Tcl-Lang 案例展示”的文档本质上是维基页面上突出显示的 Tcl/Tk 项目列表。它展示了 Tcl 脚本语言的多功能性，尤其是在与 GUI 工具包 Tk 一起使用时。

所列项目涵盖了各种应用，展示了 Tcl 在以下领域的强大功能：

*   **图形和可视化：** 创建螺线图、在 Tk 画布上渲染 3D 多面体，以及可能的通用 3D 画布实现 (Canvas3d)。
*   **GUI 开发：** 利用和扩展 Tk 的功能，包括自定义几何管理器 (Pave)、窗口部件池 (TkPool) 和用户界面引擎 (tkEngine)。
*   **游戏和模拟：** 开发各种游戏，如 1010!、TriPeaks Solitaire、Triangle Madness，以及模拟，如 HP-15 计算器模拟。
*   **实用程序和工具：** 可能的 hyperhelp 包和其他实用程序，如 GRIDPLUS2。
*   **编程概念：** 演示循环技术 (Zen Loops) 以及可能的其他编程概念 (trains3.tcl)。

一些项目标题旁边存在维基页面链接表明这些是社区贡献的项目或示例，进一步说明了 Tcl 活跃的用户群和易于获得的资源。本质上，该文档作为一个精选列表，旨在展示 Tcl 和 Tk 组合的实际应用和优势。

title: An Illustrated Introduction to Linear Algebra
summary:
This article introduces the fundamental concepts of linear algebra using accessible examples. It begins with a "money example" involving nickels and pennies to illustrate linear equations. It then transitions to a "food example" with milk and bread, introducing the need to solve systems of linear equations.

The article presents two primary approaches to solving such systems: Gaussian elimination and a visual method (row picture). Gaussian elimination is explained step-by-step, demonstrating how to isolate variables and find solutions. The row picture involves graphing each equation as a line and finding the intersection point, representing the solution.

The core of the article lies in introducing the "column picture," a key concept in linear algebra. This involves representing the equations as a single equation with vectors as coefficients. The article explains how to graph vectors and visually determine the solution by scaling and adding them to reach a target vector. It also demonstrates the algebraic equivalent, explaining how scalar multiplication and vector addition work in this context.

Finally, the article briefly touches on matrix notation as an alternative representation of the same system of equations, hinting at the importance of matrices in linear algebra. It concludes by suggesting Gilbert Strang's lectures on YouTube for further learning.
chinese_title: 线性代数图解入门
chinese_summary:
本文通过易懂的例子介绍了线性代数的基本概念。首先，用涉及五分镍币和一分硬币的“钱币例子”来说明线性方程。然后，过渡到牛奶和面包的“食物例子”，引出求解线性方程组的必要性。

本文提出了求解此类方程组的两种主要方法：高斯消元法和可视化方法（行图像）。高斯消元法通过逐步演示如何分离变量和找到解来进行解释。行图像涉及将每个方程绘制为一条直线，并找到交点，表示解。

本文的核心在于介绍“列图像”，这是线性代数中的一个关键概念。这包括将方程表示为单个方程，其中向量作为系数。本文解释了如何绘制向量图，并通过缩放和相加以达到目标向量来直观地确定解。它还演示了代数等价物，解释了在这种情况下标量乘法和向量加法如何工作。

最后，本文简要地提到了矩阵表示法，作为相同方程组的另一种表示形式，暗示了矩阵在线性代数中的重要性。文章最后建议观看Gilbert Strang在YouTube上的讲座以进行进一步学习。

title: Building a Browser for Reverse Engineers
summary:
Veritas details their journey of building a specialized browser for reverse engineering web applications, focusing on enhanced observability and anti-bot circumvention. They started with a simple Chrome extension to hook JavaScript functions like `Array.prototype.push`, but encountered limitations due to content script isolation.

They then transitioned to using the Chrome DevTools Protocol (CDP) to inject scripts at the document start, successfully hooking functions and logging calls. The project evolved into a custom Electron browser with a UI to display hooked function events, targeting fingerprinting APIs like Canvas.

The author discovered that Cloudflare's Turnstile used sandboxed OOPIFs (out-of-process iframes), bypassing their initial hooks. To address this, they leveraged the `Target.attachedToTarget` CDP event to automatically attach to new frames and inject hooks within them.

The article then delves into the challenges of anti-bot techniques detecting runtime JavaScript patches, specifically how `toString` can reveal hooked functions. Despite patching efforts, they found numerous "leaks," leading to a more radical approach: forking Chromium.

The author created a custom CDP domain called "Snitch" by modifying Blink's source code. This allowed them to emit events directly from the browser's internals, bypassing the limitations of JavaScript-level hooking. This allowed for observation of API calls at a deeper level, intended to be more resistant to anti-bot detection. The journey outlines the progressive steps taken to gain better visibility into browser behavior for reverse engineering.
chinese_title: 为逆向工程师构建浏览器
chinese_summary:
Veritas 詳述了他們構建專用瀏覽器的歷程，該瀏覽器用於逆向工程 Web 應用，重點在於增強可觀察性和繞過反爬蟲機制。他們最初使用一個簡單的 Chrome 擴展來鉤取 JavaScript 函數，例如 `Array.prototype.push`，但由於內容腳本隔離而遇到限制。

隨後，他們轉向使用 Chrome DevTools 協議 (CDP) 在文檔啟動時注入腳本，成功鉤取函數並記錄調用。該項目演變成一個自定義 Electron 瀏覽器，帶有用於顯示鉤取函數事件的 UI，目標是諸如 Canvas 之類的指紋識別 API。

作者發現 Cloudflare 的 Turnstile 使用了沙盒 OOPIF（進程外 iframe），繞過了他們最初的鉤子。為了解決這個問題，他們利用 `Target.attachedToTarget` CDP 事件自動附加到新框架，並在其中注入鉤子。

文章接著深入探討了反爬蟲技術檢測運行時 JavaScript 補丁的挑戰，特別是 `toString` 如何揭示鉤取的函數。儘管進行了補丁修復工作，他們還是發現了許多“洩漏”，導致採取了更激進的方法：fork Chromium。

作者通過修改 Blink 的源代碼創建了一個名為“Snitch”的自定義 CDP 域。這使他們能夠直接從瀏覽器內部發出事件，繞過 JavaScript 級別鉤取的限制。這允許在更深層次上觀察 API 調用，旨在更有效地抵抗反爬蟲檢測。該歷程概述了為更好地了解瀏覽器行為以進行逆向工程而採取的漸進步驟。

title: Robin Williams' daughter pleads for people to stop sending AI videos of her dad
summary:
Zelda Williams, daughter of the late Robin Williams, has publicly pleaded for people to stop sending her AI-generated videos of her father. She finds them disturbing, disrespectful, and a waste of time, stating they do not represent what her father would have wanted. This isn't the first time Zelda has voiced her concerns about AI recreations of her father; she previously criticized them as "personally disturbing" and highlighted the broader implications for actors and the entertainment industry.

Zelda's recent plea reflects a growing trend of animating deceased individuals using AI, often with captions like "bring your loved ones back to life." She argues this reduces the legacies of real people to shallow imitations, creating "disgusting, over-processed hotdogs" from their lives and work, all for fleeting social media validation. She likens AI to a "Human Centipede of content," simply regurgitating the past without genuine creativity.

Her comments come amid rising unease in the entertainment industry regarding AI, specifically in the wake of the unveiling of "AI actor" Tilly Norwood. SAG-Aftra has condemned Norwood, stating it's not a real actor but a computer program lacking life experience and emotion. Emily Blunt echoed these concerns, calling the concept "really, really scary" and urging agencies to stop taking away human connection. While Norwood's creator defends her as a "creative work" meant to spark conversation, the broader concerns about AI's impact on the acting profession and the representation of deceased individuals remain prominent.
chinese_title: 罗宾·威廉姆斯女儿恳求人们停止发送其父的AI视频
chinese_summary:
罗宾·威廉姆斯之女泽尔达·威廉姆斯公开恳求人们停止向她发送其父的AI生成视频。她认为这些视频令人不安、不尊重，并且浪费时间，并表示它们并不代表她父亲的意愿。这并非泽尔达首次表达对她父亲的AI再造的担忧；她此前曾批评它们“令人深感不安”，并强调了其对演员和娱乐业更广泛的影响。

泽尔达最近的恳求反映了使用AI动画已故人士的日益增长的趋势，通常带有“让你的爱人重获新生”之类的标题。她认为这会将真人的遗产简化为肤浅的模仿，将他们的生活和作品变成“令人作呕、过度加工的热狗”，仅仅为了短暂的社交媒体认可。她将AI比作“内容的《人体蜈蚣》”，仅仅是在反刍过去，没有任何真正的创造力。

在她发表这些评论之际，娱乐业对AI的担忧日益加剧，尤其是在“AI演员”蒂莉·诺伍德亮相之后。美国演员工会-美国广播电视演员联盟谴责了诺伍德，称她不是真正的演员，而是一个缺乏生活经验和情感的计算机程序。艾米莉·布朗特也表达了同样的担忧，称这一概念“非常非常可怕”，并敦促经纪公司停止剥夺人与人之间的联系。虽然诺伍德的创造者为她辩护，称她是一种旨在引发对话的“创造性作品”，但人们对AI对演艺职业的影响以及对已故人士的代表的更广泛担忧仍然突出。

title: Cache-Friendly B+Tree Nodes with Dynamic Fanout
summary:
This article delves into the challenges of creating cache-friendly B+Tree nodes in C++, focusing on achieving a contiguous memory layout for optimal performance. The key takeaway is that using `std::vector` for node entries introduces undesirable memory indirection and potential cache misses.

The proposed solution is the "struct hack," leveraging flexible array members (standardized in C99 and C++11). This allows defining a class with a variable-length array as its last member, enabling runtime configuration of the node's fanout (capacity) while maintaining contiguity.

The article outlines the implementation details, emphasizing the need for manual memory management using placement new and custom deallocation to construct and destroy the B+Tree node within a pre-allocated buffer.

However, this approach introduces several drawbacks: increased implementation complexity, limitations on inheritance (preventing the addition of members in derived classes without corrupting data), a reinvention of `std::vector` functionalities, and hidden data type constraints (requiring trivially copyable key-value pairs due to the use of `std::memmove` for insertion). Despite these complexities, the article argues that these trade-offs are necessary to achieve the desired high performance through cache-friendly memory layout. The article concludes by foreshadowing a discussion on node underflow strategies in a subsequent piece.
chinese_title: 具有动态扇出的缓存友好的B+树节点
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了在C++中创建缓存友好的B+树节点的挑战，重点在于实现连续的内存布局以获得最佳性能。关键在于使用`std::vector`存储节点条目会引入不必要的内存间接寻址和潜在的缓存未命中。

提出的解决方案是“结构体技巧”，利用灵活数组成员（在C99和C++11中标准化）。这允许定义一个以可变长度数组作为其最后一个成员的类，从而在保持连续性的同时，能够在运行时配置节点的扇出（容量）。

本文概述了实现细节，强调需要使用 placement new 和自定义释放进行手动内存管理，以便在预先分配的缓冲区中构造和销毁 B+ 树节点。

然而，这种方法引入了几个缺点：增加了实现的复杂性，限制了继承（阻止在派生类中添加成员而不破坏数据），重新发明了 `std::vector` 的功能，以及隐藏的数据类型约束（由于使用 `std::memmove` 进行插入，因此需要可进行浅拷贝的键值对）。尽管存在这些复杂性，但本文认为，为了通过缓存友好的内存布局实现所需的高性能，这些权衡是必要的。文章最后预示将在后续文章中讨论节点下溢策略。

title: The least amount of CSS for a decent looking site (2023)
summary:
This article outlines a minimal CSS approach for creating a decent-looking, responsive website in 2023. It focuses on improving basic aesthetics and readability with a small amount of code.

It begins by addressing potential overflow issues with images, videos, and SVGs by setting `max-width: 100%;` and `display: block;`. Next, it tackles typography, suggesting a system-ui font for broad compatibility, increasing `font-size` to 1.25rem, and adjusting `line-height` to between 1.5 and 1.7 for improved readability.

The article then demonstrates how to easily implement dark mode support using the `color-scheme` property on the `html` element, automatically adapting to the user's system preferences. It also mentions adding this to the HTML tag directly. It also advises allowing users to manually override the system preference.

Finally, it discusses limiting content width for better readability, using a `main` element with `max-width: min(70ch, 100% - 4rem);` and `margin-inline: auto;` to center the content and constrain line length within the recommended 45-90 character range. The `min()` function avoids the need for `calc()`. The author suggests using a container or wrapper class for more flexibility.

The final CSS snippet includes all these recommendations, forming a solid foundation that can be built upon for more complex website designs.
chinese_title: 打造美观网站所需的最少 CSS 代码 (2023)
chinese_summary:
本文概述了一种极简的CSS方法，用于在2023年创建一个外观尚可、响应式的网站。它侧重于通过少量代码改善基本美观性和可读性。

它首先通过设置`max-width: 100%;`和`display: block;`来解决图像、视频和SVG中潜在的溢出问题。 接下来，它处理排版，建议使用system-ui字体以实现广泛的兼容性，将`font-size`增加到1.25rem，并将`line-height`调整到1.5到1.7之间以提高可读性。

然后，本文演示了如何使用`html`元素上的`color-scheme`属性轻松实现暗黑模式支持，自动适应用户的系统偏好设置。它还提到直接将其添加到HTML标签中。它还建议允许用户手动覆盖系统偏好设置。

最后，它讨论了限制内容宽度以提高可读性，使用带有`max-width: min(70ch, 100% - 4rem);`和`margin-inline: auto;`的`main`元素来居中内容，并将行长限制在建议的45-90个字符范围内。`min()`函数避免了使用`calc()`的需要。作者建议使用容器或包装类以获得更大的灵活性。

最终的CSS代码片段包含了所有这些建议，形成了一个坚实的基础，可以在此基础上构建更复杂的网站设计。

title: No account? No Windows 11, Microsoft says as another loophole snaps shut
summary:
Microsoft is tightening its grip on Windows 11 installation by closing loopholes that allowed users to bypass the requirement for a Microsoft account. Recent Insider builds of Windows 11 remove the ability to use local commands like "start ms-cxh:localonly" during the initial setup (OOBE), forcing users to sign in with a Microsoft account and connect to the internet. Microsoft claims this change is necessary to ensure proper device configuration and prevent users from skipping critical setup screens.

This move is part of an ongoing effort by Microsoft to encourage users to use its online services, following a similar change in March that blocked the "bypassnro.cmd" script for offline installations. While workarounds like unattended installations still exist, Microsoft is actively closing these gaps. The change primarily affects unmanaged devices.

The article suggests that users who are unwilling to create or use a Microsoft account may need to consider alternative operating systems. The author frames Microsoft's actions as a game of "Whac-A-Mole" between the company and users seeking to avoid online services, and notes the increasingly difficult process of using Windows 11 on an unmanaged device without an account.
chinese_title: 没有账户？就没有 Windows 11，微软表示又一漏洞被封堵
chinese_summary:
微软正收紧对 Windows 11 安装的控制，堵塞了允许用户绕过微软账户要求的漏洞。最新Windows 11 预览版已移除在初始设置（OOBE）期间使用诸如“start ms-cxh:localonly”等本地命令的功能，强制用户使用微软账户登录并连接到互联网。微软声称此项更改是必要的，以确保正确的设备配置并防止用户跳过关键的设置屏幕。

此举是微软持续鼓励用户使用其在线服务的一部分，类似于三月份阻止离线安装的“bypassnro.cmd”脚本的变更。虽然诸如无人值守安装之类的解决方法仍然存在，但微软正在积极弥补这些漏洞。此更改主要影响非托管设备。

文章暗示，不愿创建或使用微软账户的用户可能需要考虑其他操作系统。作者将微软的行为比作该公司与试图避免在线服务的用户之间的一场“打地鼠”游戏，并指出在没有账户的情况下在非托管设备上使用 Windows 11 变得越来越困难。

title: Reconstruction of Konrad Zuse's Z3 Computer
summary:
This article details the reconstruction of Konrad Zuse's Z3 computer, led by the author, using electromechanical relays while adhering to the original circuit designs. The project began in 1997 with deciphering the Z3's plans, followed by publication of the research in 1998. A team including Dr. Frank Darius and Georg Heyne initially focused on building ten Z3 addition units, which were distributed to universities. From 2000 to 2003, the team, comprising ten individuals from various institutions, completed a fully functional Z3 replica.

To prolong the machine's lifespan and avoid purely mechanical components, a computer was used to simulate the console. The reconstruction aimed to utilize modern components without altering the Z3's original circuit logic. The Z3 addition unit used two's complement arithmetic and had two registers, capable of addition and subtraction. The original Z3 had 22 bits and two addition units, one for exponents and one for mantissas of a floating point representation.

The project was funded by the Klaus Tschira Foundation, and the design team included Frank Darius, Georg Heyne, Alexander Warth, and Raul Rojas. The reconstructed Z3 is currently housed in the Konrad Zuse Museum in Hünfeld, Germany. The Zuse Internet Archive provides a Java simulation of the Z3. The article concludes with images of the reconstructed machine, its components, and its appearance in media events.
chinese_title: 康拉德·楚泽 Z3 计算机的重建
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者领导的康拉德·楚泽 Z3 计算机的重建过程，该过程使用机电继电器，并严格遵循原始电路设计。该项目始于 1997 年，破解了 Z3 的设计图，随后于 1998 年发表了研究成果。包括 Frank Darius 博士和 Georg Heyne 在内的团队最初专注于构建十个 Z3 加法单元，并分发给各大学。从 2000 年到 2003 年，由来自不同机构的十个人组成的团队完成了完全可用的 Z3 复制品。

为了延长机器的寿命并避免纯机械组件，使用了计算机来模拟控制台。重建旨在利用现代组件，而不改变 Z3 的原始电路逻辑。Z3 加法单元使用二进制补码算术，并具有两个寄存器，能够进行加法和减法运算。原始的 Z3 有 22 位和两个加法单元，一个用于指数，一个用于浮点表示的尾数。

该项目由克劳斯·楚拉基金会资助，设计团队包括 Frank Darius、Georg Heyne、Alexander Warth 和 Raul Rojas。重建的 Z3 目前位于德国许恩费尔德的康拉德·楚泽博物馆。楚泽互联网档案馆提供 Z3 的 Java 模拟程序。文章最后展示了重建机器、其组件以及其在媒体活动中的图片。

title: Nobel Prize in Physics 2025
summary:
The 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics recognizes John Clarke, Michel H. Devoret, and John M. Martinis for their groundbreaking experiments demonstrating quantum phenomena on a macroscopic scale using superconducting electrical circuits. They showed that the bizarre properties of the quantum world, typically observed with single particles, could be realized in a system large enough to be held.

Their experiments, conducted in the 1980s, focused on a Josephson junction, a circuit with two superconductors separated by a thin insulator. They demonstrated macroscopic quantum tunneling, where the entire system of Cooper pairs (electrons in a superconductor) behaved as a single quantum particle, tunneling through a barrier that classical physics would deem impenetrable. This meant the system could transition from a zero-voltage state to a state with voltage without any apparent trigger.

Furthermore, they proved that the system's energy was quantized, absorbing and emitting energy only in specific amounts, as predicted by quantum mechanics. This was achieved by introducing microwaves and observing the system's response.

This work is significant because it bridges the gap between the microscopic and macroscopic worlds in quantum physics. Unlike other macroscopic quantum effects arising from the combination of numerous microscopic components, this experiment created a macroscopic effect (voltage) from a fundamentally macroscopic quantum state—the synchronized behavior of vast numbers of particles described by a single wave function. The research also paves the way for advancements in quantum technology, such as quantum computing, by creating artificial atoms for manipulating quantum information. Their achievements provide both practical applications and contribute to the fundamental understanding of quantum mechanics.
chinese_title: 2025年诺贝尔物理学奖
chinese_summary:
2025年诺贝尔物理学奖授予约翰·克拉克、米歇尔·H·德沃雷和约翰·M·马蒂尼斯，以表彰他们利用超导电路在宏观尺度上展示量子现象的开创性实验。他们证明了通常在单个粒子上观察到的奇异量子特性，可以在一个足够大的、可以被持有的系统中实现。

他们在 20 世纪 80 年代进行的实验主要集中在约瑟夫森结上，这是一个由薄绝缘体隔开的两个超导体组成的电路。他们展示了宏观量子隧穿效应，其中整个库珀对（超导体中的电子）系统表现为一个单一的量子粒子，隧穿通过经典物理学认为无法穿透的势垒。这意味着该系统可以在没有任何明显触发的情况下，从零电压状态过渡到有电压状态。

此外，他们证明了系统的能量是量子化的，只能以特定数量吸收和发射能量，正如量子力学所预测的那样。这是通过引入微波并观察系统的响应来实现的。

这项工作意义重大，因为它弥合了量子物理学中微观世界和宏观世界之间的差距。与其他由大量微观组件组合产生的宏观量子效应不同，该实验从根本上的宏观量子态——由单个波函数描述的无数粒子的同步行为——创造了一种宏观效应（电压）。该研究还通过创建用于操纵量子信息的人工原子，为量子技术（如量子计算）的进步铺平了道路。他们的成就既提供了实际应用，也有助于对量子力学的基本理解。

title: Swiss glaciers have shrunk by a quarter since 2015, study says
summary:
Swiss glaciers have experienced a dramatic and accelerated decline in recent years, shrinking by 25% in the past decade (since 2015), according to a study by the Swiss Academy of Sciences. This rapid melting is attributed to climate change and its associated rising temperatures.

The study highlights the particularly concerning rate of ice loss, which is far greater than observed in previous periods. The years 2022, 2023, and 2024 have seen especially significant losses. 2022 was noted for record-breaking melt.

The consequences of this glacier loss are multifaceted, impacting water resources, natural hazards (such as landslides and glacial lake outburst floods), and the Alpine landscape. The melting glaciers threaten to reduce summer water availability for downstream communities and industries. The increased instability in mountain regions due to melting permafrost also presents a growing risk. The study underscores the urgency of addressing climate change to mitigate further glacier loss and its associated impacts.
chinese_title: 研究称，自2015年以来，瑞士冰川已缩减四分之一。
chinese_summary:
瑞士冰川近年来经历了急剧加速的消融，根据瑞士科学院的一项研究，过去十年（自2015年以来）已萎缩了25%。这种快速融化归因于气候变化及其相关的气温上升。

该研究强调了冰川流失速度尤其令人担忧，远高于以往观测到的水平。2022年、2023年和2024年的损失尤为显著，其中2022年因创纪录的融化量而备受关注。

冰川流失的后果是多方面的，影响到水资源、自然灾害（如山体滑坡和冰川湖溃决洪水）以及阿尔卑斯山景观。冰川融化威胁到下游社区和工业的夏季供水。由于多年冻土融化导致山区不稳定性的增加也带来了日益增长的风险。该研究强调了解决气候变化的紧迫性，以减轻进一步的冰川流失及其相关影响。

title: A mechanic offered a reason why no one wants to work in the industry
summary:
This article explores a potential reason for the mechanic shortage in the automotive industry, sparked by Ford CEO Jim Farley's comments about 6,000 open bays in Ford dealerships. A mechanic, Wiktor Ivanovko, responded with a video suggesting that car companies themselves are to blame. He argues that manufacturers often assign unrealistically low flat-rate pay for warranty repairs, particularly for complex tasks.

Ivanovko illustrates this with the example of replacing an oil pan gasket on an F-250, requiring the removal of the cab. He claims the warranty might only pay 0.6 hours for a job that takes considerably longer, effectively costing the mechanic time and money. This sentiment is echoed by other mechanics online, who criticize engineers for designing vehicles that are difficult to repair.

The article also presents other perspectives on the mechanic shortage, including Farley's view that it's due to decreased productivity, lack of glamour, and excessive regulation. Analysts attribute it to fewer mechanic graduates, retirements, and the increasing longevity of modern vehicles. Other issues include the cost to run an auto body shop. Despite the challenges, there are signs of a potential reversal, with more mechanics graduating. Viewer comments on Ivanovko's post largely supported his criticism, advocating for engineers to have hands-on experience in the trade to better understand repair complexities.
chinese_title: 一位技工解释了为何没人想在这个行业工作
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了汽车行业技工短缺的一个潜在原因，起因是福特首席执行官吉姆·法利关于福特经销商有6000个空闲维修工位的评论。一位名叫维克托·伊万诺夫科的技工通过一段视频回应，暗示汽车公司本身应该为此负责。他认为，制造商通常对保修维修（特别是复杂的任务）分配不切实际的低计件工资。

伊万诺夫科以更换F-250上的油底壳垫片为例，说明了这一点，该过程需要拆卸驾驶室。他声称保修可能只支付0.6小时的工时，而这项工作需要花费更长的时间，实际上会耗费技工的时间和金钱。其他在线技工也赞同这种观点，他们批评工程师设计难以维修的车辆。

文章还介绍了关于技工短缺的其他观点，包括法利认为的生产力下降、缺乏吸引力以及过度监管。分析师将其归因于技工毕业生减少、退休以及现代汽车使用寿命的延长。其他问题包括经营汽车维修店的成本。尽管存在挑战，但有迹象表明情况可能会逆转，越来越多的技工毕业。观看伊万诺夫科帖子的人的评论大多支持他的批评，主张工程师应该有实际操作经验，以便更好地了解维修的复杂性。

title: Who needs Git when you have 1M context windows?
summary:
The author recounts a situation where they accidentally deleted uncommitted code that resulted in a 5% improvement in an LTV prediction model at RevenueCat. After refactoring the code and preparing it for production, the performance dropped, and they were unable to reproduce the initial improvement. Realizing they hadn't committed the changes that led to the original positive result, and having tried unsuccessfully to recreate them, the author had an idea.

They remembered that they had been using the Gemini-2.5-Pro AI model (with a 1M token context window) throughout the development process. On a whim, they asked the AI to retrieve the original, deleted `ml_ltv_training.py` file. To their surprise, the AI was able to recall and provide the exact script, allowing them to recover the lost code and the original performance gains.

The author humorously concludes that long-context LLMs can sometimes negate the need for strict Git best practices due to their ability to "remember everything."
chinese_title: 有了百万上下文窗口，谁还需要 Git？
chinese_summary:
作者回忆起一个意外删除未提交代码的情况，这段代码曾使RevenueCat的LTV预测模型提升了5%。在重构代码并准备将其投入生产后，性能却下降了，他们无法重现最初的提升。意识到他们没有提交带来最初积极结果的更改，并且尝试重新创建它们未果后，作者有了一个主意。

他们记得在整个开发过程中一直在使用Gemini-2.5-Pro AI模型（具有1M令牌上下文窗口）。一时兴起，他们要求AI检索原始的、已删除的`ml_ltv_training.py`文件。令他们惊讶的是，AI能够回忆并提供准确的脚本，使他们能够恢复丢失的代码和最初的性能提升。

作者幽默地总结说，由于长上下文LLM能够“记住一切”，有时可以抵消严格的Git最佳实践的需求。

title: Who owns Express VPN, Nord, Surfshark? VPN relationships explained (2024)
summary:
This article explores the complex relationships within the VPN industry, focusing on ownership, affiliate programs, and data privacy. It reveals that ExpressVPN is owned by Teddy Sagi through Kape Technologies, a company that also owns Cyberghost, Private Internet Access, Zenmate, and Goose VPN. NordVPN and Surfshark merged in 2022 but operate as separate brands under Nord Security. Surfshark was founded by Vytautas Kaziukonis.

The article highlights the pervasive use of paid affiliate programs by VPN companies, raising concerns about biased reviews and inflated claims. It points out that affiliate sites rarely recommend non-affiliated VPNs, even when they might be superior.

Key observations include: Surfshark's software logging identifiable user data in plain text; the lucrative payouts to VPN affiliates, with examples from ExpressVPN, NordVPN, and others; and a potential class-action lawsuit against NordVPN for its allegedly difficult cancellation process and unauthorized recurring charges.

The article also critiques Hollywood's lawsuit blaming VPNs for facilitating piracy and "murder," and points out how VPN companies use influencers to make unsubstantiated claims. It ends by noting the VPN industry's rapid growth and warns consumers to be wary of misleading marketing tactics employed by corporate VPNs that seek to dominate the market and squash independents. The article's claims are supported by verified sources and contributions from multiple researchers.
chinese_title: 谁拥有Express VPN、Nord、Surfshark？VPN关系解析(2024)
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了VPN行业内复杂的关联关系，重点关注所有权、联盟计划和数据隐私。文章揭示了ExpressVPN由Teddy Sagi通过Kape Technologies拥有，该公司还拥有Cyberghost、Private Internet Access、Zenmate和Goose VPN。NordVPN和Surfshark于2022年合并，但在Nord Security旗下作为独立品牌运营。Surfshark由Vytautas Kaziukonis创立。

文章强调了VPN公司普遍使用付费联盟计划，引发了对带有偏见的评论和夸大宣传的担忧。文章指出，联盟网站很少推荐非联盟的VPN，即使它们可能更优秀。

主要观察包括：Surfshark的软件以明文形式记录可识别的用户数据；支付给VPN联盟的高额报酬，并举例说明了ExpressVPN、NordVPN和其他公司的情况；以及针对NordVPN的潜在集体诉讼，原因是其被指控取消流程困难和未经授权的重复收费。

文章还批评了好莱坞起诉VPN助长盗版和“谋杀”的行为，并指出VPN公司如何利用网红做出未经证实的声明。文章最后指出VPN行业的快速增长，并警告消费者警惕企业VPN所采用的误导性营销策略，这些策略旨在主导市场并扼杀独立VPN。本文的论点得到了经过验证的来源和多位研究人员的贡献的支持。

title: The Mondrian introduction to functional optics
summary:
This article introduces functional optics using a novel graphical notation to simplify understanding. It avoids specific language implementations and focuses on core concepts. The author represents types as colored rectangles and values as horizontal lines within them. Algebraic data types are visualized as combinations of rectangles: products as side-by-side, and sums as stacked.

Optics are defined as a way to select sub-rectangles within a type's representation. The article explores compositionality, showing how optics can be chained together. Different types of optics are then explained graphically:

*   **Iso:** Selecting the entire rectangle, enabling conversions between types A and B.
*   **Lens:** A vertical slice, allowing `view` (A -> B) and `set` (B -> A -> A) operations, representing components of a product type.
*   **Prism:** A horizontal slice, enabling `preview` (A -> Maybe B) and `review` (B -> A) operations, representing components of a sum type.
*   **Affine Traversal:** A single inner rectangle, a combination of lenses and prisms.
*   **Traversal:** Multiple sub-rectangles, enabling `set`, `over`, and `toListOf` operations.

The article highlights that Iso, Lenses, Prisms, Affine Traversals, and Traversals each form subcategories within the broader category of Optics due to their compositional properties. While acknowledging limitations in representing all optic types (like Fold or Grates), the author argues this visual approach provides a clear and intuitive understanding of functional optics.
chinese_title: 蒙德里安函数式光学入门
chinese_summary:
本文介绍使用一种新颖的图形符号来简化理解的功能光学。它避免了特定的语言实现，专注于核心概念。作者将类型表示为彩色矩形，将值表示为矩形内的水平线。代数数据类型被可视化为矩形的组合：乘积并排，和堆叠。

光学器件被定义为一种在类型表示中选择子矩形的方式。本文探讨了组合性，展示了光学器件如何链式连接在一起。然后用图形的方式解释了不同类型的光学器件：

*   **Iso（同构）：** 选择整个矩形，实现类型A和B之间的转换。
*   **Lens（透镜）：** 垂直切片，允许`view` (A -> B) 和 `set` (B -> A -> A) 操作，表示乘积类型的组件。
*   **Prism（棱镜）：** 水平切片，允许 `preview` (A -> Maybe B) 和 `review` (B -> A) 操作，表示和类型的组件。
*   **Affine Traversal（仿射遍历）：** 单个内部矩形，是透镜和棱镜的组合。
*   **Traversal（遍历）：** 多个子矩形，允许 `set`、`over` 和 `toListOf` 操作。

本文强调，由于其组合特性，同构、透镜、棱镜、仿射遍历和遍历各自在更广泛的光学器件类别中形成子类别。作者承认在表示所有光学类型（如 Fold 或 Grates）方面存在局限性，但认为这种视觉方法提供了对功能光学清晰直观的理解。

title: Apps SDK
summary:
The Apps SDK is now in preview, allowing developers to begin building and testing applications. Full app submission will open later this year.

The focus is on quality design, urging developers to create apps that feel native to ChatGPT by utilizing provided design guidelines and focusing on conversational flows. Developers must also adhere to quality, safety, and policy standards outlined in the app developer guidelines.

The process involves planning, building, and deploying. Planning encourages developers to research and prioritize use cases for the Apps SDK. Building involves setting up and configuring an MCP server. Deployment guides developers through the process of deploying their MCP server.

Additional guides cover crucial topics such as optimizing metadata for improved discovery and behavior, addressing security and privacy considerations specific to the Apps SDK, and providing troubleshooting tips for common issues encountered during app development.
chinese_title: 应用软件开发工具包
chinese_summary:
应用SDK现已预览，开发者可以开始构建和测试应用。完整应用提交将于今年晚些时候开放。

重点在于高质量设计，敦促开发者利用提供的设计指南并专注于对话流程，创建感觉像ChatGPT原生应用的应用。开发者还必须遵守应用开发者指南中概述的质量、安全和政策标准。

该过程包括规划、构建和部署。规划鼓励开发者研究和优先考虑应用SDK的用例。构建涉及设置和配置MCP服务器。部署指导开发者完成部署其MCP服务器的过程。

其他指南涵盖了关键主题，例如优化元数据以改进发现和行为、解决特定于应用SDK的安全和隐私考虑因素，以及为应用开发过程中遇到的常见问题提供故障排除技巧。

title: Removing these 50 objects from orbit would cut danger from space junk in half
summary:
A new analysis identifies the 50 most dangerous pieces of space debris in low-Earth orbit (LEO), primarily old rocket bodies, emphasizing that removing these objects could significantly reduce the risk of collisions and further debris generation. According to the analysis, removing the top 50 objects would reduce the overall debris-generating potential in LEO by 50%, and removing just the top 10 would reduce the risk by 30%.

The report highlights a troubling trend of recently abandoned rocket bodies remaining in orbit for over 25 years, violating international guidelines. China is identified as a significant contributor to this problem, particularly with the deployment of its Guowang and Thousand Sails megaconstellations. These launches are often leaving upper stages in orbit, adding to the long-term collision hazard.

While active debris removal is technically feasible, the question of funding remains a barrier. Japan's Astroscale has demonstrated debris removal technology and is pivoting towards satellite servicing. Despite the challenges, the report emphasizes that removing even a small number of the most hazardous objects can have a significant impact on reducing the risk of Kessler Syndrome, a cascading series of collisions.
chinese_title: 从轨道移除这50个物体可将太空垃圾的危险降低一半。
chinese_summary:
一项新分析报告指出了近地轨道(LEO)中50个最危险的太空碎片，主要是废弃的火箭残骸。报告强调，移除这些物体能显著降低碰撞和进一步产生碎片的风险。分析显示，移除前50个物体将降低近地轨道50%的整体碎片产生潜力，而仅移除前10个物体就能降低30%的风险。

该报告强调了一个令人不安的趋势，即最近被遗弃的火箭残骸在轨道上停留超过25年，违反了国际准则。报告指出，中国是造成这一问题的主要因素之一，特别是其国网和千帆巨型星座的部署。这些发射活动经常将火箭上面级留在轨道上，增加了长期的碰撞风险。

虽然主动清除碎片在技术上是可行的，但资金问题仍然是一个障碍。日本的Astroscale公司已经展示了碎片清除技术，并正在转向卫星服务。尽管面临挑战，该报告强调，即使移除少量最危险的物体，也能对降低凯斯勒综合症（一种级联碰撞现象）的风险产生重大影响。

title: Devpush – Open-source and self-hostable alternative to Vercel, Render, Netlify
summary:
Devpush is an open-source, self-hostable alternative to platforms like Vercel, Render, and Netlify, enabling developers to build and deploy applications (Python, Node.js, PHP, etc.) with features like zero-downtime updates, real-time logs, team management, and customizable environments.

Key features include Git-based deployments with instant rollback, multi-language support via Docker, environment management with branch mapping and encrypted variables, real-time monitoring of build and runtime logs, role-based access control for teams, custom domain support with automatic SSL certificates, and self-hosting under the MIT license.

The quickstart guide focuses on Ubuntu/Debian servers, providing instructions for provisioning a server on Hetzner, configuring DNS records, hardening security, and installing Devpush via a simple command. It also outlines the necessary environment variables that need to be configured, including GitHub App settings, email configurations, and database credentials.

The documentation includes user guides and technical architecture details. The article also covers development setup for macOS, providing scripts for installing dependencies, starting the stack, and running database migrations. A comprehensive table details various scripts for both development and production environments, highlighting their functionalities, from provisioning servers to updating components. Finally, it explains how to set up a GitHub App for authentication and authorization.
chinese_title: Devpush - Vercel、Render、Netlify 的开源自托管替代方案
chinese_summary:
Devpush是一个开源、可自托管的平台，是Vercel、Render和Netlify等平台的替代方案，使开发者能够构建和部署应用程序（Python、Node.js、PHP等），并提供零停机更新、实时日志、团队管理和可定制环境等功能。

主要功能包括基于Git的部署，支持即时回滚；通过Docker实现多语言支持；具有分支映射和加密变量的环境管理；构建和运行时日志的实时监控；团队的角色权限控制；支持自定义域名，并提供自动SSL证书；以及在MIT许可下进行自托管。

快速入门指南侧重于Ubuntu/Debian服务器，提供了在Hetzner上配置服务器、配置DNS记录、加强安全性和通过简单命令安装Devpush的说明。它还概述了需要配置的必要环境变量，包括GitHub App设置、电子邮件配置和数据库凭据。

该文档包括用户指南和技术架构细节。文章还介绍了macOS的开发设置，提供了用于安装依赖项、启动堆栈和运行数据库迁移的脚本。一个综合表格详细列出了开发和生产环境的各种脚本，突出了它们的功能，从配置服务器到更新组件。最后，它解释了如何设置GitHub App进行身份验证和授权。

title: Deloitte to refund the Australian government after using AI in $440k report
summary:
Deloitte will issue a partial refund to the Australian government for a $440,000 report riddled with errors that was partly generated using AI. The report, commissioned by the Department of Employment and Workplace Relations (DEWR), reviewed a compliance framework and IT system related to welfare penalties for jobseekers.

The report initially contained several errors, including nonexistent references and citations, which were first highlighted by University of Sydney academic Dr. Christopher Rudge. He described these errors as "hallucinations" where the AI filled in gaps or guessed at answers.

While Deloitte has updated the report to correct the references and footnotes and admitted to using generative AI in its creation, the firm maintains that the substantive content, findings, and recommendations remain unchanged. DEWR also stated that the review's recommendations remain intact.

Labor Senator Deborah O’Neill criticized Deloitte, suggesting the firm has a "human intelligence problem" and that using AI for this work was "lamentable." She called for more scrutiny of consulting firms' practices and a preference for human expertise over AI.
chinese_title: 德勤将退还澳大利亚政府款项，因在44万澳元报告中使用人工智能
chinese_summary:
德勤将部分退还澳大利亚政府44万澳元报告款项，该报告错误百出，部分内容由人工智能生成。这份由就业和劳动关系部（DEWR）委托的报告，审查了一个与求职者福利处罚相关的合规框架和IT系统。

该报告最初包含多处错误，包括不存在的参考文献和引文，这些错误最初由悉尼大学学者克里斯托弗·鲁奇博士指出。他将这些错误描述为“幻觉”，即人工智能填补了空白或猜测了答案。

虽然德勤已经更新了报告，更正了参考文献和脚注，并承认在其创建过程中使用了生成式人工智能，但该公司坚称，实质性内容、调查结果和建议保持不变。DEWR也表示，审查的建议保持不变。

工党参议员黛博拉·奥尼尔批评德勤，认为该公司存在“人类智能问题”，并表示使用人工智能进行这项工作“令人惋惜”。她呼吁加强对咨询公司做法的审查，并优先考虑人类专业知识而非人工智能。

title: Microformats – building blocks for data-rich web pages
summary:
This article serves as a guide to consuming and utilizing data marked up with Microformats 2 (MF2) for developers. It emphasizes the importance of understanding how to parse and handle this data for various applications.

The article outlines these key steps:

1.  **Choosing a Parser:** Select an actively supported MF2 parser for your programming language from options like Go, Javascript, PHP, Python, Ruby, or Rust. Online tools are available for experimentation.

2.  **Fetching and Parsing:** The article highlights the correct handling of URLs, emphasizing the use of the effective URL for resolving relative URLs. It also points out that non-200 HTTP responses can still contain useful data.

3.  **Data Storage:** It recommends archiving the original HTML and derived data (cleaned and sanitized) rather than the intermediate canonical JSON. This allows for future updates based on parser improvements and code refinements, without repeatedly fetching data. The effective URL should be stored alongside the HTML.

4.  **Navigating MF2 Structures:** Parsed pages can contain multiple MF structs nested under "items," "properties," or "children." It's crucial to search the entire tree rather than assuming the desired struct is at the top level.

5.  **Property Value Types:** MF2 properties can have various value types, including plain strings, embedded HTML structs (with `html` and `value`), img/alt structs, and nested MF data structures. The article provides guidance on how to handle the different data structures.

6.  **Algorithms and Vocabularies:** Familiarize yourself with established algorithms like the authorship algorithm, representative h-card algorithm, and how to consume h-feed/h-entry. Explore MF2 vocabularies and real-world data to enhance support for different properties and publishing techniques.
chinese_title: 微格式 – 构建数据丰富的网页基石
chinese_summary:
本文旨在为开发者提供关于如何使用 Microformats 2 (MF2) 标记的数据的指南。它强调理解如何解析和处理这些数据以用于各种应用程序的重要性。

本文概述了以下关键步骤：

1.  **选择解析器：** 从 Go、Javascript、PHP、Python、Ruby 或 Rust 等选项中，为您的编程语言选择一个积极支持的 MF2 解析器。 可以使用在线工具进行实验。

2.  **获取和解析：** 本文重点介绍了 URL 的正确处理，强调使用有效 URL 来解析相对 URL。 它还指出，非 200 HTTP 响应仍然可以包含有用的数据。

3.  **数据存储：** 建议存档原始 HTML 和派生数据（已清理和消毒），而不是中间规范 JSON。 这样可以在不重复获取数据的情况下，根据解析器的改进和代码的完善进行将来的更新。 有效 URL 应与 HTML 一起存储。

4.  **浏览 MF2 结构：** 解析后的页面可能包含多个嵌套在“items”、“properties”或“children”下的 MF 结构。 必须搜索整个树，而不是假设所需的结构位于顶层。

5.  **属性值类型：** MF2 属性可以具有多种值类型，包括纯字符串、嵌入式 HTML 结构（具有 `html` 和 `value`）、img/alt 结构和嵌套的 MF 数据结构。 本文提供了有关如何处理不同数据结构的指南。

6.  **算法和词汇表：** 熟悉已建立的算法，如作者身份算法、代表性 h-card 算法，以及如何使用 h-feed/h-entry。 探索 MF2 词汇表和真实世界的数据，以增强对不同属性和发布技术的支持。

title: Kirigami-inspired parachute falls on target
summary:
Researchers have developed a kirigami-inspired parachute designed for accurate payload delivery, particularly for drone drops and humanitarian aid. Unlike conventional parachutes that drift due to their stabilizing gliding angle, this parachute falls vertically, directly above its target.

The design is inspired by both the Japanese art of kirigami (paper cutting and folding) and the way wind-dispersed seeds, like dandelions and maple seeds, stabilize their airflow for controlled landing. The parachute consists of a flat disc with laser-cut slits forming a kirigami pattern. When deployed, air resistance and the payload's weight deform the disc into an inverted, porous bell shape. The slits allow air to flow through in an orderly manner, minimizing turbulence and ensuring a predictable trajectory.

Tests, including dropping a water bottle from a drone at 60m, showed the parachute successfully delivered its payload on target. The kirigami-based parachutes are simpler and more affordable to manufacture than traditional parachutes, requiring only a sheet of material with sufficient rigidity. Different sizes and kirigami patterns were tested, demonstrating comparable terminal velocities with improved landing accuracy. Researchers hope future development will enable improved package delivery and humanitarian aid distribution in challenging situations.
chinese_title: 受剪纸启发的降落伞精准着陆
chinese_summary:
研究人员开发出一种源于剪纸灵感的降落伞，专为精确有效载荷投放而设计，尤其适用于无人机投放和人道主义援助。与因稳定滑翔角而漂移的传统降落伞不同，这种降落伞垂直下降，直接落在其目标上方。

该设计灵感来源于日本剪纸艺术以及蒲公英和枫树种子等风力传播的种子稳定气流以实现可控着陆的方式。该降落伞由一个带有激光切割狭缝的扁平圆盘组成，形成剪纸图案。展开时，空气阻力和有效载荷的重量会将圆盘变形为倒置的多孔钟形。狭缝允许空气以有序的方式流动，从而最大限度地减少湍流并确保可预测的轨迹。

包括从60米高的无人机上投放水瓶的测试表明，该降落伞成功地将有效载荷送达目标。与传统降落伞相比，这种基于剪纸的降落伞制造起来更简单、更经济，只需要一张具有足够刚性的材料。测试了不同尺寸和剪纸图案，证明其具有可比的终端速度，同时提高了着陆精度。研究人员希望未来的发展能够改善包裹递送和在具有挑战性的情况下的人道主义援助分配。

title: What makes 5% of AI agents work in production?
summary:
This article, "What Makes 5% of AI Agents Actually Work in Production?", delves into the complexities of building successful AI agents beyond simply using powerful base models. It highlights that the majority of AI agent deployments fail due to inadequate "scaffolding" around the models, specifically context engineering, security, and memory design.

The core argument is that "context is the seed" – effective AI agents rely on sophisticated context selection, semantic layering, and memory orchestration. The author emphasizes that Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is often sufficient when implemented effectively, involving careful feature selection, validation, and observability for context.

Governance and trust are crucial, especially regarding data lineage, access control, and explainable behavior. The article stresses the importance of human-in-the-loop design, positioning AI as an assistant and incorporating feedback loops for continuous improvement.

Memory design is presented as an architectural decision with user experience, privacy, and system implications. Memory should be abstracted as a context and behavior layer, versioned and composable, enabling personalization while respecting user privacy.

Multi-model inference and orchestration are also key, with teams routing queries based on complexity, latency, cost, and other factors. Finally, the article questions the universal applicability of chatbots, suggesting that natural language is most effective when it lowers the learning curve for complex tools.

The author concludes by identifying underexplored areas like context observability, composable memory, domain-aware DSLs, and latency-aware UX as opportunities for innovation. The real moats in GenAI will come from context quality, memory design, orchestration reliability, and trust UX.
chinese_title: 是什么让5%的AI智能体在生产环境中运行？
chinese_summary: 是什么让5%的AI智能体真正应用于生产？

title: Build files are the best tool to represent software architecture
summary:
Here's a summary of the article "Build files are the best tool to represent software architecture" based on my understanding of its general premise from the title and similar discussions:

The article likely argues that build files (like Makefiles, Bazel BUILD files, or Gradle scripts) are an underutilized but highly effective means of representing and communicating software architecture. The author probably contends that traditional architectural diagrams and documents often become outdated and disconnected from the actual codebase, while build files inherently reflect the *real* dependencies and relationships within a system.

The core argument likely revolves around these points:

*   **Build files are executable and testable:** Unlike static architectural diagrams, build files are actively used during the development process. This means they are continuously validated and kept up-to-date because any deviation from the intended architecture would break the build.

*   **Build files define dependencies explicitly:** They clearly delineate which components depend on which others, providing a concrete and unambiguous representation of the system's structure. This enforced dependency management is crucial for maintainability and scalability.

*   **Build files are machine-readable and auditable:** The structure encoded in the build file can be analyzed and visualized automatically. This makes it easier to understand the overall architecture, identify potential issues (like circular dependencies), and enforce architectural constraints.

*   **Build files facilitate modularity and encapsulation:** By defining clear boundaries between modules through dependencies in the build file, developers are encouraged to create more modular and well-encapsulated systems.

The article likely suggests that instead of relying solely on diagrams and documents, architects should focus on crafting well-structured and maintainable build files that serve as the primary source of truth for the software's architecture. Furthermore, it argues that doing so can greatly improve communication between team members and enable more effective collaboration on complex software projects.
chinese_title: 构建文件是表示软件架构的最佳工具。
chinese_summary:
以下是对文章“构建文件是表示软件架构的最佳工具”的摘要，基于我对标题和类似讨论的理解：

该文章可能认为构建文件（如Makefile、Bazel BUILD文件或Gradle脚本）是一种未被充分利用但非常有效的表示和交流软件架构的手段。作者可能主张，传统的架构图和文档经常过时并与实际代码库脱节，而构建文件本质上反映了系统内的*真实*依赖关系和联系。

核心论点可能围绕以下几点展开：

*   **构建文件是可执行和可测试的：** 与静态架构图不同，构建文件在开发过程中被积极使用。这意味着它们会持续得到验证并保持更新，因为任何与预期架构的偏差都会破坏构建。

*   **构建文件明确定义依赖关系：** 它们清晰地界定了哪些组件依赖于哪些其他组件，从而提供了系统结构的具体且明确的表示。这种强制的依赖关系管理对于可维护性和可扩展性至关重要。

*   **构建文件是机器可读和可审计的：** 可以自动分析和可视化构建文件中编码的结构。这使得更容易理解整体架构，识别潜在问题（如循环依赖），并强制执行架构约束。

*   **构建文件有助于模块化和封装：** 通过构建文件中依赖关系定义模块之间的清晰边界，鼓励开发人员创建更模块化和良好封装的系统。

该文章可能建议，架构师不应仅仅依赖图表和文档，而应专注于制作结构良好且可维护的构建文件，将其作为软件架构的主要信息来源。此外，它认为这样做可以极大地改善团队成员之间的沟通，并使他们能够在复杂的软件项目中进行更有效的协作。

title: Pdoc – Generate API documentation for Python projects
summary:
Pdoc is a tool for automatically generating API documentation for Python projects. It leverages the project's module hierarchy and requires no configuration. Pdoc boasts strong support for type annotations, cross-linking between identifiers for easy navigation, and can understand both numpydoc and Google-style docstrings.

Key features include:

*   **Automatic generation:** Pdoc automatically creates documentation based on your project's structure.
*   **No configuration needed:** Simply point pdoc at your project and it will generate the documentation.
*   **Type annotation support:** Pdoc understands and incorporates type annotations in the documentation.
*   **Cross-linking:** Enables easy navigation between different parts of the API.
*   **Docstring compatibility:** Works with both numpydoc and Google-style docstrings.
*   **Live-reloading web server:** Comes with an integrated web server that automatically updates the documentation as you make changes to your code.

Many Python projects use pdoc to document their APIs. The latest release is version 15.0.4. More information, including documentation, changelog, and links to the PyPI page and GitHub repository, can be found through the provided links.
chinese_title: Pdoc – 为 Python 项目生成 API 文档
chinese_summary:
Pdoc 是一个为 Python 项目自动生成 API 文档的工具。它利用项目的模块层级结构，无需任何配置。Pdoc 拥有对类型注解的强大支持，可实现标识符之间的交叉链接以方便导航，并且能够理解 numpydoc 和 Google 风格的文档字符串。

主要特性包括：

*   **自动生成：** Pdoc 基于你的项目结构自动创建文档。
*   **无需配置：** 只需将 pdoc 指向你的项目，它就会生成文档。
*   **类型注解支持：** Pdoc 理解并在文档中包含类型注解。
*   **交叉链接：** 实现 API 不同部分之间的轻松导航。
*   **文档字符串兼容性：** 兼容 numpydoc 和 Google 风格的文档字符串。
*   **实时重新加载的 Web 服务器：** 自带集成 Web 服务器，可在你更改代码时自动更新文档。

许多 Python 项目使用 pdoc 来记录他们的 API。最新版本是 15.0.4。更多信息，包括文档、变更日志以及指向 PyPI 页面和 GitHub 存储库的链接，可以通过提供的链接找到。

title: OpenZL: An open source format-aware compression framework
summary:
OpenZL is a new open-source data compression framework designed for structured data, aiming to bridge the gap between format-specific compressors' performance and the ease of maintaining a single general-purpose compressor. It achieves this by applying configurable transformations to reveal hidden order in data before compression, enabling superior compression ratios and speeds compared to general-purpose tools like Zstandard and xz.

Key to OpenZL is providing it with information about the data's structure, either through presets, a thin format description, or the Simple Data Description Language (SDDL). An offline "trainer" then builds an effective compression config that can be reused for similar data, embedding a concrete decode recipe into the frame. The universal OpenZL decompressor can then decompress all OpenZL files, even those compressed with different configurations.

OpenZL's benefits include higher compression ratios, comparable or improved speed, a single audited decoder for security and consistency, and the ability to continuously improve compression plans without requiring new decompressors. The framework also features runtime adaptation through control points that select the best compression branch based on lightweight statistics gathered at compression time.

While OpenZL excels with structured data like columnar numeric datasets, Parquet, and CSV files, it falls back to Zstandard for unstructured data like plain text. The project encourages community involvement through its GitHub repository and welcomes contributions. Future development focuses on expanding transform libraries, improving codec performance, enhancing SDDL, and refining the automated compressor explorer.
chinese_title: OpenZL：一个开源的、感知格式的压缩框架
chinese_summary:
OpenZL 是一种新型开源数据压缩框架，专为结构化数据设计，旨在弥合特定格式压缩器性能与维护单一通用压缩器的简易性之间的差距。它通过应用可配置的转换来揭示压缩前数据中的隐藏顺序来实现这一点，从而与 Zstandard 和 xz 等通用工具相比，实现了更高的压缩率和速度。

OpenZL 的关键在于为其提供有关数据结构的信息，可以通过预设、精简的格式描述或简单数据描述语言 (SDDL) 实现。然后，离线“训练器”构建有效的压缩配置，该配置可用于类似数据，并将具体的解码方案嵌入到帧中。通用 OpenZL 解压器可以解压所有 OpenZL 文件，即使是使用不同配置压缩的文件。

OpenZL 的优势包括更高的压缩率、相当或更高的速度、用于安全性和一致性的单一审核过的解码器，以及无需新的解压器即可持续改进压缩方案的能力。该框架还具有运行时自适应功能，通过控制点，可以根据压缩时收集的轻量级统计信息选择最佳压缩分支。

虽然 OpenZL 在柱状数字数据集、Parquet 和 CSV 文件等结构化数据方面表现出色，但对于纯文本等非结构化数据，它会回退到 Zstandard。该项目鼓励社区通过其 GitHub 存储库参与并欢迎贡献。未来的开发重点是扩展转换库、提高编解码器性能、增强 SDDL 以及改进自动压缩器探索器。

title: Using Deno as my game engine
summary:
The author is developing "Microlandia," a SimCity-inspired city builder aiming for detailed, realistic simulation using real-world data. Dissatisfied with initial progress in Go due to difficulties in creating 3D graphics and UI, the author considered using a commercial game engine but opted for an open-source solution.

They decided to port the project to Deno and TypeScript, leveraging the `webview_deno` library to create a single, cross-platform executable containing both the server (simulation) and client (React-based UI). Deno's built-in features like a SQLite client and Websocket protocol, along with its tooling (formatting, linting, etc.), proved beneficial.

The author highlights the advantages of the Deno/TypeScript stack: a streamlined development workflow with live-reloading using Vite and the Deno extension for VS Code, seamless data type sharing between client and server processes, and avoidance of complex npm dependencies for core simulation logic. While acknowledging potential performance limitations compared to Go and continued reliance on npm for some aspects, the author prioritizes rapid iteration and focus on the game's core simulation aspects over technical hurdles. Microlandia is available as a free prototype download.
chinese_title: 使用 Deno 作为我的游戏引擎
chinese_summary:
作者正在开发一个名为“微境（Microlandia）”的城市建造游戏，该游戏受《模拟城市》启发，旨在利用真实世界的数据进行详细、逼真的模拟。由于在Go语言中创建3D图形和UI存在困难，作者对最初的进展并不满意，曾考虑使用商业游戏引擎，但最终选择了开源解决方案。

他们决定将项目移植到Deno和TypeScript，利用`webview_deno`库创建一个包含服务器（模拟）和客户端（基于React的UI）的单一、跨平台可执行文件。Deno的内置功能，如SQLite客户端和Websocket协议，以及其工具（格式化、linting等）都证明是有益的。

作者强调了Deno/TypeScript堆栈的优势：使用Vite和VS Code的Deno扩展进行实时重新加载的简化开发流程，客户端和服务器进程之间无缝的数据类型共享，以及避免了核心模拟逻辑对复杂npm依赖的需要。虽然承认与Go相比可能存在性能限制，并且仍然依赖npm的一些方面，但作者优先考虑快速迭代并将重点放在游戏的核心模拟方面，而不是技术障碍。微境（Microlandia）可作为免费原型下载。

title: Microsoft clamping down on Windows 11 local account setup
summary:
This article discusses Microsoft's increasing efforts to make using a Microsoft account mandatory during the Windows 11 setup process (Out of Box Experience or OOBE). Microsoft is actively removing "local-only commands" and methods users previously employed to bypass the online account requirement. This change, currently in the Dev channel of Windows Insider Preview Build, forces users to sign in with a Microsoft account to complete the setup, or risk the OOBE crashing.

The article highlights that while older bypass methods like "bypassnro" have already been disabled, a script-based unattended installation is still a workaround. The timing of this move coincides with the impending end of active support for Windows 10, leading to speculation that Microsoft aims to promote its Microsoft 365 and OneDrive services to a larger pool of migrating users.

While this change is only in the Dev channel currently, its eventual public release is likely. Commenters express concerns about the forced Microsoft account, citing bloatware installation, data mining, and unwanted advertising on a paid operating system. Some suggest creating a local account after the initial setup or using older versions of Windows 11 to bypass the requirement. The Rufus tool is also mentioned as having the option to disable OOBE/NRO when creating a bootable USB drive for Windows installation.
chinese_title: 微软收紧Windows 11本地账户设置
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了微软在Windows 11安装过程（开箱即用体验或OOBE）中强制用户使用Microsoft帐户的力度日益增强。 微软正积极移除用户之前用来绕过在线帐户要求的“仅本地命令”和方法。 目前，此更改在Windows预览体验计划的开发者频道中，它强制用户使用Microsoft帐户登录才能完成设置，否则可能导致OOBE崩溃。

文章指出，虽然像“bypassnro”这样的旧绕过方法已被禁用，但基于脚本的无人值守安装仍然是一种替代方案。 这一举动的时间与Windows 10即将结束主动支持的时间相吻合，这引发了人们的猜测，即微软旨在向更大规模的迁移用户推广其Microsoft 365和OneDrive服务。

虽然此更改目前仅在开发者频道中，但最终公开发布的可能性很大。 评论者表达了对强制使用Microsoft帐户的担忧，理由包括在付费操作系统上安装臃肿软件、数据挖掘和不必要的广告。 有些人建议在初始设置后创建本地帐户，或使用旧版本的Windows 11绕过此要求。 创建Windows安装的可启动USB驱动器时，Rufus工具也被提及具有禁用OOBE/NRO的选项。

title: RediShell: Critical remote code execution vulnerability in Redis
summary:
Wiz Research discovered a critical Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability, CVE-2025-49844, dubbed RediShell, in Redis. This vulnerability, with a CVSS score of 10.0, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on the Redis host by sending a malicious Lua script, granting them full system access. RediShell exploits a 13-year-old Use-After-Free memory corruption bug in Redis's Lua interpreter.

With Redis used in an estimated 75% of cloud environments, the potential impact is extensive. Approximately 330,000 Redis instances are exposed to the internet, with about 60,000 having no authentication configured. The combination of internet exposure and lack of authentication poses a critical risk, enabling attackers to achieve RCE. Even internal network exposure is high risk.

Organizations are strongly urged to immediately update to the latest patched version of Redis. Recommended actions include enabling authentication, disabling unnecessary commands (especially Lua scripting if unused), running with minimal privileges, enabling logging and monitoring, and implementing network-level access controls. Wiz customers can leverage Wiz's Threat Center to assess risk.

Wiz Research thanked the Redis security team for their collaboration. The vulnerability highlights the reliance on open-source technologies and motivated the launch of ZeroDay.Cloud, to identify and responsibly disclose critical zero-day vulnerabilities in open-source cloud software.
chinese_title: RediShell：Redis 存在严重远程代码执行漏洞
chinese_summary:
Wiz研究发现Redis中存在严重远程代码执行(RCE)漏洞RediShell (CVE-2025-49844)。该漏洞CVSS评分为10.0，攻击者可通过发送恶意Lua脚本在Redis主机上执行任意代码，从而获得完整的系统访问权限。RediShell利用了Redis的Lua解释器中存在的一个13年前的释放后重用内存损坏漏洞。

据估计，75%的云环境都在使用Redis，因此潜在影响范围广泛。约有33万个Redis实例暴露在互联网上，其中约6万个未配置身份验证。互联网暴露和缺乏身份验证的结合构成了重大风险，使攻击者能够实现RCE。即使是内部网络暴露也具有很高的风险。

强烈建议各组织立即更新到最新修复版本的Redis。建议采取的措施包括启用身份验证、禁用不必要的命令（尤其是不使用的Lua脚本）、以最小权限运行、启用日志记录和监控以及实施网络级访问控制。Wiz客户可以利用Wiz的威胁中心来评估风险。

Wiz Research感谢Redis安全团队的合作。该漏洞突显了对开源技术的依赖，并促使ZeroDay.Cloud的推出，旨在识别并负责任地披露开源云软件中的关键零日漏洞。

title: Show HN: Greenonion.ai – AI-Powered Design Assistant
summary:
Greenonion.ai is an AI-powered design assistant that helps users generate designs quickly and easily, even without prior design experience. The platform allows users to describe their ad concept, upload an image, and then utilizes AI to create unique designs tailored to their needs. Users can then fine-tune these designs with an easy-to-use editor and download high-quality ads ready for various platforms.

Key features include instant ad generation, professional-looking designs, and format optimization for different channels.

Greenonion.ai offers tiered subscription plans: Creator ($19/month), Professional ($49/month), and Enterprise ($149/month). Each tier provides a different number of design credits, generations, access to features, and support levels.

The site also includes a customer design showcase, a comprehensive FAQ section addressing common questions, and a call to action encouraging users to start their design journey with a no-commitment signup. The website itself is built with Framer.
chinese_title: Show HN: Greenonion.ai – AI驱动的设计助手
chinese_summary:
Greenonion.ai：人工智能驱动的设计助手，即使没有设计经验，也能帮助用户快速轻松地生成设计。用户只需描述广告概念、上传图片，平台便可利用人工智能创建满足其需求的独特设计。用户随后可以使用易于使用的编辑器微调这些设计，并下载适用于各种平台的高质量广告。

主要功能包括：即时广告生成、专业级设计和针对不同渠道的格式优化。

Greenonion.ai提供分级订阅计划：创作者（每月 19 美元）、专业版（每月 49 美元）和企业版（每月 149 美元）。每个级别提供不同数量的设计积分、生成次数、功能访问权限和支持级别。

该网站还包括客户设计展示、解决常见问题的全面常见问题解答部分，以及鼓励用户通过无承诺注册开始设计之旅的行动号召。该网站本身是用 Framer 构建的。

title: AMD stock skyrockets 23% as OpenAI looks to take stake in AI chipmaker
summary:
AMD's stock surged by 23% following the announcement of a deal with OpenAI, where OpenAI may acquire a 10% stake in AMD. OpenAI will deploy up to 6 gigawatts of AMD Instinct GPUs, starting with a 1-gigawatt rollout in 2026. AMD issued OpenAI a warrant for up to 160 million shares, vesting based on deployment and share price milestones. OpenAI's president, Greg Brockman, cited a lack of compute power as a limitation on launching new features.

The deal, worth billions, positions AMD as a strategic partner to OpenAI and marks a large GPU deployment agreement. AMD CEO Lisa Su emphasized the importance of partnerships for advancing AI technology. The collaboration could alleviate supply chain pressures and reduce OpenAI's reliance on Nvidia.

This AMD partnership follows OpenAI's recent $100 billion equity-and-supply agreement with Nvidia. OpenAI is also in talks with Broadcom for custom chips, highlighting a trend of capital, equity, and compute being traded among a small group of AI companies. This circular economy raises concerns about potential strain.

For AMD, the deal is a commercial victory and validates its AI accelerator technology, providing a flagship customer amidst the AI boom. OpenAI's Stargate project aims to transform it into a major infrastructure builder, with sites featuring a mix of suppliers, including AMD.
chinese_title: AMD股票飙升23%，因OpenAI有意入股人工智能芯片制造商。
chinese_summary:
AMD股价在与OpenAI达成协议后飙升23%，OpenAI或将收购AMD 10%的股份。 OpenAI将部署高达6吉瓦的AMD Instinct GPU，2026年将首先推出1吉瓦。 AMD向OpenAI发行了高达1.6亿股的认股权证，该认股权证根据部署情况和股价里程碑进行归属。 OpenAI总裁格雷格·布罗克曼 (Greg Brockman) 表示，缺乏计算能力是推出新功能的限制。

这项价值数十亿美元的交易使AMD成为OpenAI的战略合作伙伴，并标志着一项大型GPU部署协议。 AMD首席执行官苏姿丰强调了合作对于推动人工智能技术的重要性。 此次合作可以缓解供应链压力，并减少OpenAI对英伟达的依赖。

在与AMD达成合作之前，OpenAI最近与英伟达达成了价值1000亿美元的股权和供应协议。 OpenAI还在与博通洽谈定制芯片事宜，凸显了一种资本、股权和算力在少数人工智能公司之间交易的趋势。 这种循环经济引发了对潜在压力的担忧。

对于AMD来说，这笔交易是一次商业上的胜利，验证了其人工智能加速器技术，并在人工智能繁荣时期提供了一个旗舰客户。 OpenAI的“星际之门”项目旨在将其转变为一家主要的infrastructure建设者，其站点将混合使用包括AMD在内的多家供应商的产品。
